description.narrative: The project objective is to help improve the delivery of urban services through enhancing the quality of urban infrastrucuture, and strengthening the institutional and financial frameworks for urban services at the ULB and state levels. Key objectives include: - Strengthen institutional and financial frameworks in urban service delivery at ULB and state. - Improve the qhality of infrastructure and mobilize financial resources in participating ULBs - Improve roads system in Bangalore and the sanitary conditions of the population in eight ULBs surrounding Bangalore city, while ensuring financial viability and sustainability

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Art III Section 3.02 (a) (b)) | Description :BMP, BWSSB and KUIDFC, through KUIDFC to prepare and furnish to theBank a Financial Monitoring Report, in form. The Bank FMR not la ter than 45 days after the end of the first quarter aftereff.date | Frequency :Quarterly

Finance Agreement :Art III Section3.01 (ii) a&b | Description :BMP to have the financial statements for each fiscal year auditednot later than six months after end of each fiscal year | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Art-III, Section 3.01(II)a&b | Description :KUIDFC and BWSSB to have the financial statements for each FiscalYear audited, not later than six month after end of each fiscal ye ar | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :PA Sch 2(10) | Description :BWSSB shall carry out appropriate measures for the purpose of operating andmaintaining the water and sewerage systems in the Greate r Bangalore area | Due Date :30-Jun-2007
Finance Agreement :PA Sch2 11 | Description :Operating Ratio of BWSSB to be below 90% during each of the next five years |Frequency :Yearly
Finance Agreement :PA Sch2 12(b) | Description :BWSSB shall complete construction of all sewage treatment plants under Part C. 2(a)of the Project | Due Date :31-May-2014
Finance Agreement :PA Sch2 8 (b) | Description :The DMA shall commence implementation of the Institutional Developmen t Componentfor the ULBs | Due Date :30-Apr-2007
Finance Agreement :PA Sch2 9 (a) | Description :Preparation of the State Long Term Urban Development Strategy | Due Date:30-Sep-2008
Finance Agreement :PA Sch2 9(b) | Description :Preparation of the State Urban Finance Framework by March 31, 2007 | Due Date:23-Jun-2008
Finance Agreement :PA Sch2 9(c) | Description :KUIDFC Business Model by march 31, 2007 | Due Date :30-Sep-2008

title.narrative: All funded projects meet appraisal and sector rules of engagement, as determined by technical audits
Number of ULBs participating in the institutional development TA and municipal investment support components reporting improved municipal services
Number of participating ULBs reporting improved municipal services in the intervened sector, eg. water supply and sewerage, accessibility (roads), solid waste management and other municipal services
Number of ULBs receiving loans/grants and/or Quantum of funds accessed by ULBs
New household sewer connections constructed under the project
Number of new, working sewerage connections provided in Greater Bangalore
Number of people in urban areas provided with access to Improved Water Sources under the project
BWSSB: Improved BWSSB Cost recovery, with 90% operating ratio
Number of ULBs with computerized basic municipal functions (in property tax management, accounting and budgeting, grievance redressal and birth/death registrations
Number of ULBs having geo-referenced, large scale mapping which are used in basic land management and planning functions
BMP: Length of Road (in Kms) in good condition as a result of the project
Number of ULBs with new budgeting and accouting systems in place which are being used for FM purposes
Number of urban sector staff trained in the state (covering ULB staff, UDD, KUIDFC, etc.) on various modules of basic municipal functions under KMRP
Project Development facility operational and capacity building support is being accessed by ULBs for investments.
New State Urban Finance Framework/business model for KUIDFC established

actual.value: New State Urban Finance Framework- forwarded to GoK for further action. Business Model for KUIDFC established- TA studies carriedout under ADB project.
